name: Instant Pot® Steel-Cut Oats
author: MoMosGoGo
summary: Steel-cut oats and the Instant Pot®: Two of my favorite 'discoveries' from the last 10 years. Top with ground flax seed, hemp seed, cinnamon, fruit, honey, syrup, vanilla extract, nut butter, etc.
directions: Combine water and oats in an electric pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 3 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes
